DOC.brief_summary: The vitamin , mineral amino acid supplementation 3 month improve semen parameter , fertilization rate embryo quality subfertile men undergo IVF treatment
DOC.brief_title: Supplement Intake Infertile Men ; Effect Sperm Parameters , Fertilization Rate Embryo Quality
DOC.detailed_description: With supplement intake contain amino acid , vitamin mineral design improve sperm parameter , couple undergo IVF treatment benefit change improvement sperm parameter increase fertilization rate improve embryo quality thus allow short time pregnancy achievement less frustration long duration treatment
DOC.criteria: healthy male age 2050 least one IVF cycle without pregnancy sperm parameter : Oligospermia 520*106 Teratospermia 614 % normal form Asthenospermia < 30 % motility female factor infertility age > 50 20 testicular problem physical examination history malignancy /or chemotherapy usage antiandrogen/testosterone history drug abuse/alcohol know endocrinological problem current STD genitourinary infection Retrograde Ejaculation Y chromosome microdeletion Karyotype abnormality
